item.title: Use swiyu, the Swiss E-ID to authenticate users with Duende and .NET Aspire
item.description: This post shows how to authenticate users using Duende IdentityServer and ASP.NET Core Identity which verifies identities (verifiable digital credentials) using the Swiss Digital identity and trust infrastructure (swiyu).
